For over forty years Eliot Fisk has enjoyed a career as one of America's leading performing in recording guitarist in November two thousand Seventeen Eli Fisk spoke about what inspires him musically
The diplomatic all guys I I think are are in incredibly inspirational as as well as you know many other people I mean I think Bruce Springsteen paternity incredible show you know there's so much to learn from these people or
Even in Raleigh ... wages from ... in the energy the communicative power and sometimes the way they structure it probably like I've seen some of the Rolling Stones causes on on YouTube and stuff like that or or on TV or whatever
And I think the way they structure a concert it's fascinating and indeed the involvement they have with with the audience and the way they get people involved and the lack of innovation you know they really know what they're doing you know and it's so polished and so professional and they you know they really have it together
Did you ever wish that you'd have been a a rock guitar
No because I don't really like the feel of the instrument at all in my hand so I pick up a an electric guitar just feels like a like a like a ton of bricks I mean I like to hear people who play it well like my friend bill for his alley or played with I mean it it sounds absolutely poetic beautiful
You know uh so I mean I thought that I have many prejudiced against it but it's just sort of what you like I mean I I
